survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and usage patterns regarding eco-friendly office supplies to help organizations make more sustainable purchasing decisions.

questions.question_text: How often do you use eco-friendly office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge current adoption rates. Use a Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use eco-friendly office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple selections allowed to identify popular items.

script.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use (or not use) eco-friendly office supplies?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use (or not use) eco-friendly office supplies?

questions.question_text: If your company provided more eco-friendly office supplies at no extra cost, how likely would you be to use them?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Always' to Q1
questions.client_notes: This helps measure potential adoption if barriers are removed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons). Skip logic for those who already 'Always' use eco-friendly supplies.

script.question_text: If your company provided more eco-friendly office supplies at no extra cost, how likely would you be to use them?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Always' to Q1

questions.question_text: What additional eco-friendly office supplies would you like to see your company offer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unlisted ideas. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: What additional eco-friendly office supplies would you like to see your company offer?
